definition: 10th earthly branch: 5-7 p.m., 8th solar month (8th September-7th October), year of the Rooster/ancient Chinese compass point: 270° (west)
esterase, enzyme that breaks up esters by hydrolysis

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 没有苯甲酸酯，铝，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐剂苛刻。

sentences.english: The present invention discloses a process for making terpene esters.
sentences.chinese: 公开了制备萜烯酯的方法。

sentences.english: Ascorbyl oleic acid ester is a good kind of antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 抗坏血酸油酸酯具有强抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: Study on the use of acetic anhydride as a co reagent of fatty acid to synthesize cellulose esters.
sentences.chinese: 采用乙酸酐为共反应剂合成了纤维素高级脂肪酸酯。

sentences.english: Studying the chemical method in transforming lutein esters to lutein.
sentences.chinese: 建了化学法转化叶黄素酯为游离态叶黄素的工艺。

sentences.english: Antisepsis and fresh-keeping effects of polyol fatty acid ester are summarized in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文综述了多元醇脂肪酸酯的防腐保鲜作用。

sentences.english: The technology of one step synthesis of terpinyl acetate from turpentine and glacial acetic acid is described.
sentences.chinese: 论述了松节油与冰乙酸一步法合成乙酸松油酯工艺。

sentences.english: Results Methenolone acetate was prepared in high yield.
sentences.chinese: 结果此法以较高收率合成了美替诺龙醋酸酯。

sentences.english: Using polyethylene glycol dimaleate as crosslinking agent, a high water-absorbent resin was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 用聚乙二醇双马来酸酯作交联剂制备高吸水性树脂。

sentences.english: Methacrylate polymer emulsion is an important ingredient of floor coating.
sentences.chinese: 丙稀酸酯聚合物是地板蜡产品中的一个重要成分。

sentences.english: Only polyol esters have been found to satisfy this demanding application.
sentences.chinese: 只有多元醇酯找到满足此要求苛刻的应用程式。

sentences.english: Diagnostic criteria and principles of management of occupational acute pyrethroids poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 职业性急性拟除虫菊酯中毒诊断标准及处理原则。

sentences.english: Functions of laminarin sulphate in anti?angiogenesis and anti?tumor.

sentences.english: Recently the reactivity of nitric esters in the presence of hydrazine has been investigated .
sentences.chinese: 人们近来研究了有肼存在时硝酸酯的反应性。

sentences.english: Study on the catalytic synthesis of ethyl caproate by sodium hydrogen sulfate;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究硫酸氢钾在合成己酸己酯工艺中的催化性能。

sentences.english: The antiwear capacity of a borate containing nitrogen was evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 对一种含氮硼酸酯添加剂的抗磨性能进行了评价。
